metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19337 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage version 3 in the way the Ceph RADOS Gateway daemon handles S3 requests. An authenticated attacker can abuse this flaw by causing a remote denial of service by sending a specially crafted HTTP Content-Length header to the Ceph RADOS Gateway server.

notes.Note: sbeattie> Red Hat claims upstream ceph is not affected

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
